Package game.gameactors.enemies

Class Enemy

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.actors.Actor
game.gameactors.enemies.NPC
game.gameactors.enemies.Enemy
All Implemented Interfaces:
Capable, Printable, DeathRuneDroppper
Direct Known Subclasses:
CastleEnemy, EarthEnemy, FireEnemy, OceanEnemy, Skeleton, WindEnemy
public abstract class Enemy
extends NPC
implements DeathRuneDroppper
The Enemy class is an abstract class representing a type of actor that can attack and be attacked by other actors. It includes methods to select an action to perform during its turn and to check if it can target another actor.
See Also:
NPC, DeathRuneDroppper

  • Constructor Details

    • Enemy

      public Enemy​(char displayChar, int hitPoints, int minRuneDrop, int maxRuneDrop, java.lang.String name)
      Constructor for the Enemy class.
      Parameters:
      displayChar - the character that will represent the Actor in the display
      hitPoints - the Actor's starting hit points
      minRuneDrop - the minimum number of runes this Enemy drops upon death
      maxRuneDrop - the maximum number of runes this Enemy drops upon death
      name - the name of the Actor

  • Method Details

    • playTurn

      public Action playTurn​(ActionList actions, Action lastAction, GameMap map, Display display)
      Selects a valid action to perform during this Enemy's turn.
      Overrides:
      playTurn in class NPC
      Parameters:
      actions - collection of possible Actions for this Actor
      lastAction - The Action this Actor took last turn. Can do interesting things in conjunction with Action.getNextAction()
      map - the map containing the Actor
      display - the I/O object to which messages may be written
      Returns:
      the valid action that can be performed in that iteration or null if no valid action is found

    • allowableActions

      public ActionList allowableActions​(Actor otherActor, java.lang.String direction, GameMap map)
      Returns the allowable Actions for this Actor.
      Overrides:
      allowableActions in class Actor
      Parameters:
      otherActor - the other Actor that is being attacked.
      direction - the direction in which the attack is happening.
      map - the map containing the Actor.
      Returns:
      an ActionList containing the allowable Actions for this Actor.

      public Rune getDeathRune()

      Returns:

    • canTarget

      public boolean canTarget​(Actor otherActor)
      Determines if the Enemy can target the given Actor.
      Specified by:
      canTarget in class NPC
      Parameters:
      otherActor - the Actor to check if it can be targeted by the Enemy.
      Returns:
      true if the Enemy can target the Actor, false otherwise.
